title: Android Developer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Extended Web AppTech Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
3+ years of experience in Android development. Experience with Android SDK. Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON, knowledge of MVC architecture, JSON/ XML data format. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs. Proficient in Java, with a good knowledge of its ecosystems.

Capable of handling web service integration - RESTful, JSON, SOAP, XML to connect with Back-end Services. Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies. Tools: Git/ SVN, Redmine/ Bugzilla/ TFS, Android Studio/ Eclipse.

Complete understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, particularly agile SDLC model, SRS/ PRD document, work estimate, unit testing, test cases. Good technical communication skill (verbal /written).

Proven working experience in Android development. Experience with Firebase ( Preferred Skill). Published at least 2-3 original apps in play store.

title: Social Media Marketing Executive
tagsAndSkills: Digital Marketing,Social Media Marketing,social media strategy,Instagram,content creation,Social media,Marketing,Content
jobDescription:
As a Social Media Marketing Executive at ENDURANCE TECH, you will be responsible for developing and implementing our social media strategy in order to increase our online presence and improve our marketing and sales efforts.

You will manage our social media accounts and ensure our brand message is consistent across all platforms. This role requires excellent knowledge of various social media platforms, attention to detail, and creative thinking.

Responsibilities:
Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy to align with business goals
Create and curate engaging content for social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.)
Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics and make recommendations for improvement
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications
Collaborate with other departments to manage reputation, identify key players, and coordinate actions
Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner, and monitor customer reviews
Oversee social media accounts design (e.g., Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures, etc.)
Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions.

title: Quality Analyst
tagsAndSkills: Escalation Management,Complaint Management,7Qc,Call Monitoring,Customer Satisfaction,Complaints,Complaint Handling,Quality analysis
jobDescription:
Shift Time: 24/7 with 2 rotational off

Domain; Customer service (complaint management)


Experience


  • Minimum 2- 3 years of Contact Center Experience with social media or Complaint Management desired
  • Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills
  • Outstanding customer service skills and dedication to provide exceptional customer care
  • Analytical & Exceptional time management & listening skills
  • Must be able to effectively deal with people at all levels with internal & external stakeholders of the Company
  • Process certification will apply in case the candidate does not meet the above criteria

Technical Competencies

  • Ensures adherence to contractual Quality Scores are met
  • Responsible for monitoring agent - customer interactions (both call and transaction) against client specified policies and procedures
  • Provide domain knowledge & track external & internal escalations
  • Responsible for conducting calibration with all the stakeholders of business to ensure standards
  • Report contact handling performance and statistics through monitoring and test contact evaluation.
  • Participate in huddle sessions, share inputs with team members related to error trends, process updates and tech issues. Working in close tandem with Asst. Managers and SME's on the process for an excellent team and process performance.
  • Report contact handling performance and statistics through daily and weekly reports
  • Review evaluations, maintain call recordings for audits
  • Prepare performance evaluations and documenting contact-handling procedures
  • Prepare TNAs basis the audit done and coordinate with the training team to ensure the TNA is executed
  • Effective One-on-one feedback to the associates basis the audit done
  • Calibrate with VFS Global customer and circulate learning to the Agents/floor
  • Perform day to day transactional monitoring as per the defined format and sampling
  • Provide detailed feedback on transaction handling process as well as softer aspects of the behaviour.
  • Document and provide feedback to Agents.
  • Report quality trends and variances to management center.
  • Update the findings on the CRM defined by VFS
  • Ad hoc one-on-one coaching of Agents.

Others:

  • Communicate company vision, mission, and goals. Ensure complete alignment of the functional / service line teams to overall company objectives
  • Responsible for complying with all QMS and ISMS Policies and procedures
  • Ensure data confidentiality, integrity and protection of company's intellectual property
  • Create a work environment that nurtures and supports diversity and has an inclusive work culture

Mandatory:

  • Excellent communication and management skills
  • Excellent customer and client relationship skills
  • Commitment to achieve deadlines provided and result oriented
  • Ability to make sound judgment & be decisive
  • Logical thinking and attitude for learning
  • Delight customers, and go above and beyond the call of duty
  • Has empathy for the customers situation
  • Works with highest degree of accuracy and with eye for detail
  • Build a long-term relationship with the customer in the best interest of both customer and client
  • Able to work under pressure and with stringent timelines during times of need in rotational shifts/day and even on regional holidays

title: Risk Analyst

ambitionBoxData.Title: HDB Financial Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  • The candidate will be responsible for: Requirement Study & Analysis for implementation of functional requirements in the system.
  • Issue analyses and escalations as per escalation matrix.
  • Functional testing (including on UAT environment) and ensure timely implementations of risk rules in the system.
  • Execution of reports for Quality Check purposes.
  • Preparation of Requirement Document basis the business requirements raised by Policy team.
  • Troubleshooting system related issues including interaction with the vendor for resolution of
    the same.
  • Implementation of Risk Rules in the system (including UAT and final implementation).
  • Handling various system related projects.

Preferred candidate profile :

  • Prior experience in Credit Underwriting for Retail Lending products.
  • As a added advantage if the candidate is coming from a background of BFSI industry and/or
  • having knowledge on scripting SQL.
  • Bachelor or equivalent Degree from recognized university.
  • Should have minimum 3 years of relevant experience.
